sentences.en: A: 20 ? Unbelievable. Then how many workers do you embody?
sentences.cn: 20家,真令人难以置信. 那么你们有多少员工?

sentences.en: All of these embody the regularity of disciplinary construction of curriculum theory.
sentences.cn: 这一切体现了课程论学科建设的规律性.

sentences.en: As the middle school student, what respect does patriotism spirit embody in?
sentences.cn: 作为中学生, 爱国主义精神体现在什么方面?

sentences.en: For twenty-nine years, Checkpoint Charlie embodied the Cold War.
sentences.cn: 29年来，查理检查站具体象征了冷战。

sentences.en: Hemingway's characters plainly embody his own values and view of life.
sentences.cn: 海明威笔下的角色明确反映出他自己的价值观与人生观.

sentences.en: In the elementary school mathematics teaching how to embody?
sentences.cn: 在小学数学教学中如何体现?

sentences.en: It was autonomy which this humane and self - sufficient man seemed to embody.
sentences.cn: 这位既有人情味而又自负的人体现的似乎就是自主.

sentences.en: Jack Kennedy embodied all the hopes of the 1960s.
sentences.cn: 杰克•肯尼迪体现了20世纪60年代的全部希望。

sentences.en: She embodies everything I admire in a teacher.
sentences.cn: 她具备了我所钦佩的教师该具备的一切素质。

sentences.en: That trend embody in all of eye movement index.
sentences.cn: 在各种眼动指标上都有体现.

sentences.en: The connotation of chemical quality education embody technical quality and affective quality.
sentences.cn: 化学素质教育的内涵包括学科素质及情感素质.

sentences.en: The experiment of ten scientist is embody in the report.
sentences.cn: 十位科学家的试验情况收入了那份报告.

sentences.en: The latest locomotives embody many new features.
sentences.cn: 这些最新的机车具有许多新的特色.

sentences.en: The latest model embodies many new improvements.
sentences.cn: 最新的款式包含了许多新的改进。

sentences.en: The two clues embody the same expression by effect - anxiety of effect - anti - effect.
sentences.cn: 二者以影响?“影响的焦虑”? 反 影响为共同表征,似乎走的是一条“循环”之路.

sentences.en: Their attitudes embody the extremes of nature, mercurial and intense.
sentences.cn: 它们的形态包含了全部自然天性 、 活泼和有力量的一切.

sentences.en: This fierce contrast in thoughts can more embody new ideas and vigor.
sentences.cn: 在思想上产生强烈的对比,更体现新的观念和活力.

sentences.en: To embody the model of dictionaries, we have to revise inaccurate annotations.
sentences.cn: 要真正体现字典词典的典范性, 就必须修订那些有所欠缺的释义.
言语具体表现各种思想和感情.

trans.tran_en: to be a very good example of an idea or quality

trans.tran_cn: 代表， 表现， 体现； 包括； 包含； 收录
trans.tran_en: to be a very good example of an idea or quality
